name: Galla
description:
An expressionless gynoid of medium frame, with peculiarly hard smooth skin with a semi-glossy sheen. Impossibly straight, medium length, bob cut hair covers the top of her head, as her bangs taper down before cleanly cutting off at her perfectly shaped eyebrows, that frame her cold, yet unnaturally clear bright eyes, small mouth, and oval shaped face.

Her mechanical, perfectly proportioned body is dressed in some form of strange metallic armour; resembling some kind of short crop top with shoulderless sleeves and elbow length arm bracers. A frontless, ankle length skirt wraps around her waist, and two horn shaped head pieces are attached to the sides of her head. All in all, they do nothing to cover up her c-cup gravity defying breasts, sculpted rubbery torso, long, tapering, dynamically lined angular legs that end at her flat tipped triangular feet, and her brazenly displayed compact pussy.

She has intricately plated arms with concave fittings, going all the way to her hands, and her sublimely padded fingertips. Her wide curved hips accentuate her bottomed out hourglass figure. Her entire body is also lined with shallow, wide sweeping grooves, that along with her exposed spurred gear joints, and fluorescent glowing womb tattoo, serve as highlights to her sleek feminine body.
encyclopedia:
Automatons or Automata are a series of gynoids, thought to be some type of advanced Golem animated by sophisticated demonic energy and complex mechanical systems. They possess a high amount of intellect, capable of processing data at inhuman speeds and memorizing vast quantities of information, as well as strong and durable bodies, made out of unknown materials and highly advanced technology.

Their bodies are equipped with several mechanisms, weapons, and parts that seem to be designed specifically with the intention of extracting the spiritual energy of humans; male or otherwise. Experts believe they predate all the way back to the early human and monster girl wars. Their bodies have also been enchanted with magic that allows them to convert spiritual energy into an alternative source of power, which they use as a backup in case something goes wrong.

Automatons are highly rational, non willful beings that do not seem to express their emotions well, if they are even capable of feeling them at all. Automatons exhibit a rather service oriented mindset, seeing servitude as their primary directive in life, and devoting themselves in serving whoever they recognize as their master by following their every command, and even taking the initiative in attending to their needs in the most exemplary way possible. They often serve as guardians or bodyguards and are extremely hostile to those they consider as intruders or threats.

Replication using current technology is currently deemed impossible; however, in recent years major breakthroughs have been made enabling us to perform modifications on their bodies and fixing broken parts. Not much is known about the origins of these Automata; however, experts believe that more information can be found deep inside the ancient ruins of which they guard.
